text: @DrRPNishank @NewIndianXpress @PrabhuChawla @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive Sir please cancel the CBSE board exam of class 10 and 12 as it is dangerous for school authorities and students to give exams . I am 100% sure that there will be many new COVID-19 student patient if exam happend.  Please sir please cancel exams🙏🙏🥺🥺
